articles.author: Kate Rogers
articles.title: Jersey Mike's strikes European expansion deal led by founder Peter Cancro - CNBC
articles.description: Jersey Mike's plans to open 400 stores in the U.K. and Ireland, with more locations to follow in Europe.
articles.content:
Jersey Mike's Subs is taking its signature sandwiches overseas with its first European expansion set for this year, the company said Monday. 
Leading the push is the brand's founder and board chair,… [+2285 chars]
